title: Concerns for Rams and Buccaneers; Motivating the Lions; Cam vs. Rodgers celebration
itunes:title: Concerns for Rams and Buccaneers; Motivating the Lions; Cam vs. Rodgers celebration
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Rachel Bonnetta, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager and Nate Boyer open with their concerns for the Los Angeles Rams after their blowout loss to the San Francisco 49ers on Monday Night Football; then they dive into which team is overcoming more this season - the Green Bay Packers or Tennessee Titans; they're joined by Scott Pioli who shares his thoughts on how the L.A. Rams are built, the Tampa Bay Buccaneers aging roster and Mac Jones development; Rachel Bonnetta gives a fiery motivational speech for the Detroit Lions; then they're joined by Dan Hanzus for his latest edition of Power Rankings; and lastly, Nate Boyer shares his experiences and involvement in the military.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
